pageContent: Purpose: The effect of obesity on prostate cancer detection and behavior remains uncertain. We evaluated the impact of obesity, as measured by body mass index, in a case series of 500 consecutive men who underwent a modern 10 to 12 core biopsy approach.

metaData.source:
Value of magnetic resonance spectroscopy imaging and dynamic contrast-enhanced imaging for detecting prostate cancer foci in men with prior negative biopsy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/20197480/
